resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
<span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #fafafa;">This character looks like Henri IV, successor of Henri III. He was at Saint-Cloud when the king has been murdered but he seems a little bit too old.
<span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #fafafa;">It may be a way of showing what will happen next, as Henri IV will aslo be assassinated.
resource.chars:
This character looks like Henri IV, successor of Henri III. He was at Saint-Cloud when the king has been murdered but he seems a little bit too old.

It may be a way of showing what will happen next, as Henri IV will aslo be assassinated.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: An expression of distress, as he was just stabbed by Jacques Clément

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
<span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #fafafa;">Member of the "Forty-Five", the close protection team around the King. 
<span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #fafafa;">He is wearing the same hat as the King. It's maybe to show his friendship so we can suppose this character is Roger of Bellergarde, a close friend of the King who was there when the murder happened.
resource.chars:
Member of the "Forty-Five", the close protection team around the King. 

He is wearing the same hat as the King. It's maybe to show his friendship so we can suppose this character is Roger of Bellergarde, a close friend of the King who was there when the murder happened.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
Member of the "Forty-Five", the close protection team around the King. 

 

Or he may be King's nephew, Charles of Angoulême, the illegitimate son of the late Charles IX.
resource.chars:
Member of the "Forty-Five", the close protection team around the King. 

 

Or he may be King's nephew, Charles of Angoulême, the illegitimate son of the late Charles IX.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Necklace from the Knights of The Holy Spirit, an order created by Henri III to ensure the loyalty of the princes and noblemen of the court.

resource.chars:
Jacques Clément, murederer of Henri III. He has been stabbed to death right after his crime. His body has been thrown out of a window. 

AS a monk, he is wearing the traditional dominican robe, in balck and white

He is shown in the dark, to oppose the king who is in the light.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Famous hat worn by Henri III. He did not wear a crown and all his portraits show this little hat with a diamond plume.
resource.chars: Famous hat worn by Henri III. He did not wear a crown and all his portraits show this little hat with a diamond plume.
